Package com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager.contents

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CellBuilder
    Something that can be built into a table cell, OR just something rendered within a box model (like HTML) where the table-free cell is the box.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cell
    A styled table cell or layout block with a pre-set horizontal width. Vertical height is calculated based on how the content is rendered with regard to line-breaks and page-breaks.
    ScaledImage
    Represents a Jpeg image and the document units it should be scaled to. When a ScaledImage is added to a PdfLayoutMgr, its underlying bufferedImage is compared to the images already embedded in that PDF file. If an equivalent bufferedImage object is found, the underlying image is not added to the document twice. Only the additional position and scaling of that image is added. This significantly decreases the file size of the resulting PDF when images are reused within that document.
    Table
    Use this to create Tables. This strives to remind the programmer of HTML tables but because you can resize and scroll a browser window, and not a piece of paper, this is fundamentally different. Still familiarity with HTML may make this class easier to use.
    TablePart
    A set of styles to be the default for a table header or footer, or whatever other kind of group of table rows you dream up.
    TableRow
    Unsynchronized mutable class which is not thread-safe. The internal tracking of cells and widths allows you to make a cell builder for a cell at a given column, add cells in subsequent columns, then complete (buildCell()) the cell and have it find its proper (now previous) column.
    Text
    Represents styled text kind of like a #Text node in HTML.
    WrappedCell
